price: Say, “The One Who created them in the first place will give life to them, for He has full knowledge of every created being;
arabic: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
